programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Career aptitude tests have an unexpected effect on the Simpson kids, prompting Lisa to fall in with a bad crowd while perennial troublemaker Bart finds a new respect for law and order.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition gets underway at the Oak Tree Cottage in Burley, Hampshire, where owner Jacqui Castle and her sidekick Jane Waters hope the homely approach will win the day. Guests Martin and Catherine Crosswaite are not encouraged by the shared facilities, while breakfast served at a communal table is not to the liking of Norman Butcher and Lorraine Watkins.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The second visit of the week is to Bath's The Rising Sun Inn, where owners Lorraine Hawkins and Norman Butcher hope to bring their guests up to standard by having a dress code. Following their feedback on the last visit, Jacqui and Jane take an extra critical eye to the rooms, while Martin and Catherine show their competitive streak during a boules match.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants travel to the Busfeild Arms in East Morton for the third day of the contest, where hosts Martin and Catherine Croswaite pride themselves in giving great Yorkshire hospitality. Jacqui is overwhelmed by the luxury and extras in the rooms, which raises questions about how the owners make a profit. Meanwhile, Martin shocks the group by sharing his stunt motorbike riding past, and later, Patrick feels the pressure of being the final host.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The final stopover is at Patrick Duggan's Beatles-themed Epstein House in Liverpool, the former home of band manager Brian Epstein's father. Jacqui and Jane are unimpressed by unpleasant smells in the bedroom, while Martin and Catherine show they will do anything to win during a game of Fab Four charades. At dinner, Patrick shocks his guests when he reveals his idea of the ideal woman. Will it have an effect on their feedback?.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The B&B owners meet for the final time to find out what they've been paid and to settle some scores. Jacqui and Jane from the Oak Tree Cottage want to find out why Norman and Lorraine wouldn't return, while Martin and Catherine from the Busfeild Arms have some explaining to do when it comes to their profit margins. Accusations fly around the table as payments are revealed and the winner is announced.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps Gary and Susie, who want to start a new adventure in Florida's beautiful Sarasota Keys. For their budget of £220,000 they're after a place to escape the British winters, as close to the amazing beaches of the Gulf of Mexico as possible. Jonnie shows them how far their budget will stretch in this highly desirable corner of the US.(n)

Matt and Lucia's house in Royal Wootton Bassett, Wiltshire, is bulging at the seams, as it is home to not only them but three grown-up children from previous relationships. Matt loves it but Lucia does not, so while Kirstie tries to change the layout, Phil finds some alternative properties. But will the family choose to up sticks or stay where they are?.(n)

Along the way, he visits a world-famous stone circle and explores an ancient burial chamber that is older than the pyramids, follows in the tracks of Celtic chariots, and discovers the story behind a white horse.(n)

Plus, Georgie Barrat meets sailor Ben Ainslie in Bermuda, where he is planning to triumph in the America's Cup boat race having created one of the most technologically advanced boats ever. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jimmy and his dog Boas find a dangerous weapon, while Kev and Pete are involved in a high-speed pursuit. An armed response team is called out to deal with a drunken man brandishing a gun, while Andy is confronted with am aggressive drink driver refusing to take a breath test.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Paul Jackson has his work cut out stopping a runaway van driver who is causing havoc, while a street disturbance leads Paul Faulkner and Lee Wilson to stare down the barrels of a shotgun. Plus, Kev Salter and the team raid a cannabis farm and make a shocking discovery.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Ian Stapley pursues a trail of sparks left by a car thief with a burst front tyre, while Jacko heads up the firearms team as they look for two men seen in possession of a sawn-off shotgun. Shadow the police dog nearly takes a bite of a barricaded burglar and Kev Salter deals with a heroin user who hides her stash in a hard-to-reach place.(n)

programme.title: FIA Formula E Live

programme.title: Nightmare Tenants, Slum Landlords
programme.desc: Kent couple Rachel and Chris are pushed to the limit when their relationship with their tenant breaks down and she stops paying rent, leaving them more than £5,000 out of pocket. Now they need to get her out or they could lose the house. Elsewhere, a tenant uses scare tactics to keep his landlord off his back, and in Harrow, council housing officers investigate a residential property that has been turned into a brothel.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: A man whose amateur radio hobby caused upset in his quiet retirement village when he erected a 30ft mast, kicking up a storm of protest from his neighbours who claimed it was affecting their health. Plus, a woman who was forced to take out an injunction against her neighbour over his aggressive behaviour, and a couple who moved back to their home town with their four children and menagerie of pets - only to hear rumours being passed around, shortly followed by a visit from the council about the state of their home.(n)

programme.title: The Nightmare Neighbour Next Door
programme.desc: Pensioner and single dad George chose a Grimsby cul-de-sac for a bit of peace and quiet, only for a raucous twentysomething to move in next door and start throwing loud parties. But when George complained, violence erupted - and blood was spilled. In Croydon, old friends became enemies when one couple's car began to block access to the other's home, while Stoke musicians Anne and Dave were puzzled when their neighbour complained about the noise they were making, since they were 200 miles away performing at the time.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: Paul and Ben try to drill through the locks on a property to evict the residents, only to find to their surprise that the door has been modified with some special reinforced metal. Elsewhere, Delroy and Brian try to reclaim money a garage owes to a customer and are shocked by the condition of the vehicle in question, and a woman who has acted as guarantor for her sister's tenancy does not realise the extent of her responsibilities.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: In Staffordshire agents try to collect nearly £2,500 in unpaid parking fines, while officers Matt and Gary head to the West Midlands to recover £4,500 owed from a debtor to his former girlfriend. Elsewhere, agents travel to south east London looking to collect £3,000 owed by a taxi company.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing the housemates' reactions to the first eviction, as well as the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs and diary room visits. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: The Best of Bad TV
programme.desc: A look back at the decade that brought many opportunities for eye-popping errors, but few more ill-conceived than sitcom Heil Honey I'm Home!, which featured fictionalised versions of Adolf Hitler and Eva Braun living next door to a Jewish couple. The intention was to spoof 1950s American sitcoms, but most critics felt the show fell short on taste and decency.(n)

programme.title: Lip Sync Battle UK
programme.sub-title: Lip Sync Battle UK: Peter Andre vs Gino D'Acampo.
programme.desc: Melanie Brown and Professor Green present the musical game show as reality star Peter Andre and presenter and Italian TV chef Gino D'Acampo go head to head lip-synching to hit songs. Their first choice of song is anticipated to be relatively sober, but for their second the celebs must bring it all to the floor - with wigs, costumes and backing dancers.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
programme.desc: A velvet-clad, sex-crazed secret agent from the 1960s agrees to be put into a state of suspended animation after his arch-enemy escapes justice. Thirty years later he is defrosted to do battle with the power-mad villain again, but the mission proves nearly as daunting for him as getting to grips with 1990s social values. Spoof spy adventure, with Mike Myers, Elizabeth Hurley, Mimi Rogers, Michael York and Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Property expert Ann Maurice offers advice to Teresa and Nigel Parfitt, the would-be sellers of a two-bedroom semi in Cradley Heath in the heart of the Black Country. Ann sets about ridding the house of its clutter and collectibles, tones down the garish decor and tries to rectify the hygiene problems that come with having four dogs.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Angels of Jarm
programme.desc: David loses confidence in his painting ability.(n)

programme.title: Roary the Racing Car
programme.desc: Roary fetches a batch of eggs from the farm for Big Chris.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The monkey tries to get a hole in one at golf.(n)

programme.title: Mr Men
programme.desc: The inhabitants of Dillydale try out lots of different activities.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Bop Box
programme.desc: Derek Moran and Olivia Birchenough compete in a street dance versus classical ballet dance-off.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig organises a chocolate egg hunt for Peppa and her friends.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in a rescue helicopter.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Gertie the giraffe needs help bending down to take a drink, so Wissper enlists the help of Peggy the penguin to raise the water level.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: A storm washes away Chompy the beaver's dam, so he looks for new wood at Farmer Yumi's farm, and it is up to the Ryder and the pups to repair the damage.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The handyman and his hard-working pals have a host of adventures as they restore the town of Fixham to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: James and Sarah are always competing with each other, but when a tree in the forest is hit by lightning, they are forced to co-operate.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: Bazza cheats in the Bumpton pie contest and wins a trip for two to the town's finest hotel, but is not sure who to take with him.(n)

programme.title: Olly the Little White Van
programme.desc: The friends try to secure Sir Ronald Grump's assistants new jobs after they are sacked, but struggle to find out what they are good at.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: When the Pups stage a medieval play in the town square, Cap'n Turbot's castle stage prop ends up collapsing and trapping him.(n)

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: AJ and Blaze meet another monster truck in the woods, and take their new friend to a mud festival.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Hiding Pirates.
programme.desc: When Scurvy the parrot arrives at Toy Green for the Pirate Parade all on his own, Noddy soon realises the pirates are missing and investigates why they are hiding.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: A baby bear cub has trouble sleeping, and Wissper asks Dan the wise panda for advice.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: King Thistle struggles to cope during a busy day in which he has to launch a boat, judge a competition and make a speech.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It's time for Shimmer, Shine, and Leah to celebrate their Wishaversary. Leah's thrilled to celebrate her friendship with her favourite genies.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.desc: The youngster opens a cafe with Algie as her waiter, but discovers that running the shop requires a lot of organisation.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The piglet teaches her visiting baby cousin Alexander his first word.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit injures her ankle, so her sister and friends offer to cover for her at the ice-cream stand.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Ben uses his elf skills to win at games, so Holly teaches him a lesson.(n)

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: The Fugitoid reveals his terrible secret as Ulixes returns to Earth to stop Mozar from destroying the world. David Tennant guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Agent Cody Banks
programme.desc: A junior secret agent begins his latest mission by starting at a new school and befriending a classmate with the intention of spying on her scientist father - but realises all the training in the world cannot help him with the tricky business of talking to girls. Family adventure, starring Frankie Muniz, Hilary Duff, Angie Harmon, Keith David and Arnold Vosloo.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Hoppsy goes after a disqualified motorist who hurdles two fences in his attempts to get away, Damo deploys a stinger in a bid to stop a drunk driver and Kev solves the mystery of a car abandoned in a field. Plus, Spike deals with a drug driver with a mouthy girlfriend and Lee has a strange weekend involving a burning car, two inebriated men and a large garden gnome.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: A reckless car thief seems intent on causing carnage, while the pursuit of an unlicensed driver through a housing estate has grave consequences. Inspector Ed Turner turns up more than he bargains for when the pursuit of a suspected heroin user takes a turn for the worse, and elsewhere officers face one of the biggest challenges of their careers when a stolen JCB goes on the rampage.(n)

programme.title: FIA Formula E Live
programme.desc: The second Berlin ePrix race. Coverage of the second of two races staged at the Tempelhof Airport Street Circuit in Berlin, which serves as the eighth round of the season.(n)

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: A rebellious, hip-swinging student from the city moves to a small religious community, where he instantly clashes with an old-school fire-and-brimstone preacher - who has banned dancing and rock 'n' roll because he considers them immoral. Drama, starring Kevin Bacon, Lori Singer, John Lithgow, Chris Penn, Dianne Wiest and Sarah Jessica Parker. Includes 5 News Update at 5.15pm.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Dancing
programme.desc: Premiere. Musical remake of the romantic drama. Abigail Breslin stars as an awkward teenager staying with her family at a holiday camp in the 1960s. She embarks on a life-changing romance with the camp's charismatic dance instructor (Colt Prattes), despite the disapproval of her parents and the condemnation of society in general. With Bruce Greenwood, Debra Messing and Billy Dee Williams. Edited for sexual content.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Weekend
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Daily round-up of highlights, revealing how the housemates are getting on under the all-seeing eye of Big Brother, featuring the latest tasks, games, arguments, laughs, diary room visits and bedroom chit-chat. Narrated by Marcus Bentley.(n)

programme.title: Friends with Kids
programme.desc: Premiere. Two single people notice that the spark seems to go out of their attached friends' relationships when they have children. They decide to avoid this problem by having a baby together while continuing to date other people, but find the arrangement more complicated than expected. Comedy, directed by and starring Jennifer Westfeldt. With Adam Scott, Maya Rudolph and Kristen Wiig. Includes 5 News Update at 11.00pm.(n)

programme.title: Auto Focus
programme.desc: True story of the colourful life and mysterious death of legendary television actor Bob Crane, star of Hogan's Heroes(n)

programme.title: Olvidados
programme.desc: General Jose Mendieta (Damien Alcazar) writes a letter to his son Pablo (Bernardo Pena) after suffering a heart attack and confesses the role he played in torturing and executing men and women as part of Operation Condor in Chile in this drama. The CIA backed campaign of political repression was responsible for imprisoning and executing countless men and women in Latin America in the 1970s. Journalist Marco (Carlotto Cotta) and his wife pregnant wife Lucia (Carla Ortiz) were among many people who suffered under Mendieta and his cohort Sanera (Rafael Ferro Guapas). Olvidados was Bolivia's Foreign Language Film Submission for the 87th Academy Awards. The film is directed by Carlos Bolado(n)

programme.title: Undercover Brother
programme.desc: Eddie Griffin scores as a hip secret agent in this hilarious spoof of blaxploitation flicks, directed by Malcolm D. Lee. Griffin's character works for a black spy organization that's battling "The Man" and his efforts to suppress black culture. Denise Richards costars as White She-Devil. Chris Kattan, Dave Chappelle(n)

programme.title: Chasing Papi
programme.desc: A man learns the hard way that, when it comes to women, three is more than a crowd in this frantic comedy. Tomas Fuentes (Eduardo Verástegui) is a successful advertising man living in Los Angeles who has a way with the ladies. Almost too much of a way, in fact, since he's currently dating three beautiful women in three different cities: Lorena (Roselyn Sanchez), a bright and attractive lawyer living in Chicago; Cici (Sofía Vergara), a cocktail waitress from Miami with a fiery personality; and Patricia (Jaci Velasquez), a New Yorker looking to get out from under the domineering shadow of her mother. As it happens, all three women are fans of noted television astrologer Walter Mercado, and on his advice, they each decide to take a bold step in their relationships and visit Tomas in L.A. Needless to say, the women are enraged to discover Tomas' rather spectacular infidelity, but that turns out to be the least of his problems after a mixture of booze and tranquilizers lands him in the hospital, a pair of crooks (D.L. Hughley and Freddy Rodriguez) kidnap him, and he discovers Cici and Patricia are wanted by the law. Produced under the title Papi Chulo, Chasing Papi was the first feature film from director Linda Mendoza after an extensive resume of credits in television comedy(n)

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her daughter retreat to what they believe is a secure sanctuary during a brutal home invasion. Newly divorced Meg Altman (Jodie Foster) and her young daughter Sarah (Kristen Stewart) move into a New York brownstone equipped with a panic room; a hidden chamber built as a sanctuary in the event of unwanted "visitors," unaware of how soon they will need it. When their home is the target of a seamless late-night break-in, Meg and Sarah take a stand from the sanctuary of the panic room, playing a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with three intruders: Burnham (Forest Whitaker), Raoul (Dwight Yoakam) and Junior (Jared Leto), during a brutal home invasion(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: Basketball coach Dan Haskins recruits a team of predominantly black players to play for his team in racially segregated and football-mad Texas. They must overcome the many challenges that face them if they are to prove victorious against Division I favourites Kentucky(n)

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: American army chiefs begin to commit troops to Vietnam in 1964, starting with Lt Colonel Hal Moore and his Air Calvary Division. Training begins, and Moore's wife Julie joins the army wives to see the men off to battle. Arriving in South Vietnam they are assigned a search-and-destroy mission on rural land. Another platoon spots the enemy and gives chase, unaware they are heading toward a stronghold of the North Vietnamese army. Stranded under fire, the pressure is on for Moore's men, who fortify their position and begin a long, intense battle to save their comrades. It is the first of many such encounters in a brutal conflict..(n)

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, and Martin Sheen star in this ensemble drama detailing the daring real-life rescue of 33 Chilean miners who were trapped in the San Jose Mine for 69 days in 2010. Patricia Riggen directs from a script by Jose Rivera and Mikko Alanne(n)

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk
programme.desc: Doses of radiation turn a mild-mannered scientist into an angry, uncontrollable monstrosity in this adaptation of the Marvel Comics series. Lou Ferrigno, who played the Hulk in the 1970s TV series, has a cameo as a security guard and provides the voice of the Hulk(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: When hippie-esque psycho Scorpio goes on a killing spree, Inspector Harry Callahan and new partner Chico are assigned to hunt him down, but not before the Mayor and Lt. Bressler admonish Callahan about his heavy-handed tactics(n)

programme.title: Heartbreak Ridge
programme.desc: Action drama in which an old Vietnam veteran who is disillusioned with the hi-tech, by-the-book modern military, requests a posting to his old unit to see out his soldiering days. Tough and foul-mouthed, the marine sergeant puts a squadron of lazy young recruits through their paces, turning them into a well disciplined fighting unit - just in time for a hazardous rescue mission to the small Caribbean island of Grenada(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: A compelling tale of the unlikely friendship that develops between a bigoted Korean War veteran and an Asian teen who, under threat from some gangbangers, tries to steal his car: a cherry 1972 Gran Torino(n)

programme.title: Ride Along 2
programme.desc: Friction continues between an aspiring cop and his seasoned partner (and future brother-in-law) as they pursue a Miami drug lord together with the help of a savvy detective(n)

programme.title: Three Kings
programme.desc: At the end of the Gulf War, U.S. soldiers George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg and Ice Cube set off on a secret mission to find stolen Iraqi gold(n)

programme.title: Living Legend
programme.desc: A Peruvian drug lord is forced to move out of his mother's house(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: A San Francisco police detective investigates a vigilante group murdering purported gangsters who have evaded the law. He soon begins to suspect his partner may be a key figure in the organization(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Con artists Will and Jake Grimm (Matt Damon and Heath Ledger) encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse that requires more than their usual fakery(n)

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: Explorer Rick O'Connell and his wife Evelyn are asked by the British government to take a magical diamond back to China. Unfortunately the jewel has the power to resurrect the evil Emperor Han, who long ago was transformed into a mummy along with his cut-throat army of soldiers. Soon the race is on to prevent Han from returning to life and taking over the world(n)

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Former LA cop Brian O'Conner is making his living as a street racer in Miami when he is recruited by an FBI agent to help catch a local drug baron(n)

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A raunchy yet heartfelt comedy from director Judd Apatow about Amy (Amy Schumer), a commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City, who must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her(n)

programme.title: National Lampoon's Animal House
programme.desc: An uptight college dean is determined to have his most unruly frat house expelled, enlisting the help of the most respectable house on campus(n)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD(n)

programme.title: Australia
programme.desc: Epic romantic adventure, set just prior to World War II, about an English aristocrat and the rugged drover who helps her with the cattle station she inherited(n)

programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Cop Brian O'Conner goes undercover in LA's dangerous street- racing underworld to snare hard-driving car criminal Dominic Toretto(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The Red Badge of Gayness. The entire town of South Park turns out for the annual re-enactment of a civil war battle(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cancelled. The boys are abducted by aliens, who inform them that Earth is actually a reality show that is about to be canceled by intergalactic media moguls(n)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Night of the Living Homeless. As the number of homeless people in South Park begins to grow at an alarming rate, some begin to view their presence as an opportunity while others view it as evidence of a sad state of social inequity. When the vast majority of the population decides to simply ignore the problem, the unyielding quest by the indignant to obtain some spare change quickly spirals out of control(n)

programme.title: Key & Peele
programme.desc: Slap-Ass: In Recovery. Sketches include a mobster seeking vengeance on someone who wronged him; a baseball player fighting an addiction to unwanted bodily contact; and "Family Matters"' Steve Urkel driving a man insane(n)

programme.title: Key & Peele
programme.desc: Series Premiere. In the premiere of this sketch-comedy series, President Obama expresses his true feelings with help from an anger translator; Lil Wayne gets used to life in jail; and two men tread carefully when it comes to talking about the women in their lives(n)

programme.title: Laugh-In
programme.desc: Sock it to me! Hosted by Dan Rowan and Dick Martin, this groundbreaking variety show was a fast-moving barrage of jokes, one-liners, running skits, and musical numbers(n)

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid Programming(n)

programme.title: Shark Rocket Complete with DuoClean Technology - For Floors & Carpets
programme.desc: World's first & only no loss of suction ultra-light upright vacuum, even more suction power than any Rocket before, advanced swivel steering, transforms to a portable vacuum, easily cleans drapes, under appliances, upholstery & car – still under $200(n)

programme.title: BISSELL Revolution Pet Pro
programme.desc: The NEW BISSELL Revolution Pet Pro is the best deep cleaning system for pet messes – with features, tools, and formulas specifically designed for pet parents(n)

programme.title: Try Total Gym for $14.95
programme.desc: Total Gym Fit is the only piece of fitness equipment you need to get into the best shape of your life! 30 Day Risk-Free Trial for only $14.95. Call today!(n)

programme.title: PiYo Craze!
programme.desc: Define your body with PiYo. Chalene Johnson's new lower-impact workout series combining the muscle-sculpting benefits of Pilates, Yoga and fluid motion all-in-one!(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Garage Sale. To help with finances, the Formans have a garage sale. Hyde, wanting to help out as well, makes his special brownies to sell, even though Eric warns him not to, the brownies fall into the wrong hands(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Red's Last Day. Red and his co-workers get drunk after their final day on the job(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: The Velvet Rope. While Jackie gives Kelso a "glam" look, Eric, Kelso and Fez try to impress a bouncer to join Donna in a hot new club. Meanwhile, Red goes job hunting(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Laurie and the Professor. Eric catches Laurie making out with her former professor(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Halloween. The gang make some startling discoveries when they return to their old, arson-torched grammar school; a flashback shows the Halloween night when Kitty told Red she was pregnant. Grandma: Marion Ross. Frank: Pat Finn. Kelso: Ashton Kutcher. Hyde: Danny Masterson. Fez: Wilmer Valderrama(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: Vanstock. After Jackie declines, Kelso invites Laurie to a festival, which doesn't escape Donna, but better miss Jackie, for Kelso's sake(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show
programme.desc: I Love Cake. Eric is lost for meaningful words after hearing those three little ones from Donna, whose dad leaves home and moves in with the Formans(n)

programme.title: That '70s Show

programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story
programme.desc: Dead Woman Walking: The Karla Faye Tucker Story. This documentary, part of the American Justice series from A&E, examines the Texas death penalty case of Karla Faye Walker. Narrated by American Justice host and producer Bill Kurtis, this episode goes inside the investigation of the two murders that Walker and her boyfriend Daniel Ryan Garrett committed. The trial of Walker is shown through exclusive footage. After the conviction, American Justice follows her through her daily life, showing her prison surroundings and talking with her about her crimes. Sentenced to death, while Walker was waiting to be executed, she became a born-again Christian. Her lawyers used this transformation as leverage to try to get her death sentence reduced to life in prison. Their attempts were unsuccessful and Walker was killed by lethal injection in February 1998. American Justice also shows interviews with lawyers and law enforcement professionals who knew Walker(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: What Happened to Carrie Culberson?. The case of Carrie Culberson, who disappeared in 1996. Her boyfriend, Vincent Doan, was convicted of her murder, but the body was never found. Host: Bill Kurtis(n)

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: Free to Murder Again. The Texas penal system wakes up from a nightmare in the A&E program American Justice: Free to Murder Again. The subject of the documentary is serial killer Kenneth McDuff, the biggest mistake the parole board ever made. McDuff was first sentenced to death in 1968 for killing three teenagers. Seemingly, his incarceration meant the end of his murder spree. But due to the overcrowding of Texas jails, McDuff was eventually released after serving only 21 years. Soon, the criminal was back on the streets harassing children and adults alike. In 1991, McDuff abducted and killed a young woman only to repeat the pattern two years later with a pregnant mother of two. When he was captured and resentenced to death, his murderous trail was reported to include a handful of others. McDuff's situation alerted the government to the failures of the parole boards. His case eventually resulted in a slew of new prison constructions and tough law reforms(n)

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May embark on a project to build a car that can turn into a hovercraft and bring relief to flooded areas. Their efforts do not start smoothly, but it is not long before the trio are demonstrating the brilliance of their creation with an eventful journey down the River Avon. Plus, Jeremy grabs the keys to two variants of the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG supercar - the V8-engined Black Series with a roaring 622bhp, and the 740bhp Electric Drive, which is powered by four electric motors. X-Men and Les Miserables star Hugh Jackman is the latest celebrity to take the new Reasonably Priced Car around the test track.(n)

Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series.(n)

programme.title: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: 23 Days. A book-smart greenhorn and a rock climber take on the savannah of Namibia. Also, a former survivalist returns(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione return to seek out more classics in need of restoration, beginning with a Porsche 928 that has suffered from years of water damage. The car's bubbled paintwork, seized brakes and rusting nuts, bolts and screws seem bad enough, but it gets worse when the vehicle's complicated electrics go haywire and trap Mario inside. Once Bernie and his team of mechanics have serviced the engine, the car is taken to a rolling road to put it through its paces, before former racing driver Paul O'Neill assesses its value to see if all the work has been worthwhile.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: The duo restore a Fiat 500, which was Italy's answer to the Mini when it was launched in July 1957 and marketed as a cheap, practical and fuel-efficient town car. Bernie Fineman immediately puts Mario Pacione's nose out of joint by spending £1,500 on a bright orange wreck that will not even start and makes matters worse by laying out another £2,000 behind his back to coax an extra six brake horsepower out of the 500cc engine. Former racing driver Paul O'Neill judges their efforts and decides whether Bernie's improvements make the difference between a profit and a loss. Plus, the car's history is charted through archive footage, revealing what inspired the designers and why their creation was such a success.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione set out to restore a 1960s VW camper van, but end up paying a small fortune for a rusty vehicle with no doors and a completely rotten interior. Halfway through the four-week project, extensive bodywork repairs and unexpected mechanical issues mean that there is no money left in the budget to refit the inside of the van - but one of the mechanics reveals a secret talent.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione are working to a tight deadline - and even tighter budget - to restore a Mercedes 450SL that has seen better days back to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione decide to restore a 1970s VW Beetle, but after finding one at a good price it turns out to be rotten to the core when they take it back to their garage. Bernie is less than pleased with the purchase, but Mario's plan to put a two-litre engine into the vehicle's tiny engine bay brightens his mood.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione are working to a tight deadline, and even tighter budget, to restore a Ferrari that has seen better days to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione set out to restore a DeLorean - one of the most recognisable cars of the 1980s due to its starring role in the classic movie Back to the Future. After finally tracking one down, they discover that the supposedly rust-resistant machine has been reduced to a shadow of its former self, while carelessness in the garage results in an additional bill for a replacement window.(n)

programme.title: Classic Car Rescue
programme.desc: Bernie Fineman and Mario Pacione scour scrapheaps, wastelands and back yards to find classic cars in need of restoration. As well as finding the parts that can bring the vintage wrecks back to life, they learn about the stories behind the machines and reveal why they occupy an important place in automotive history.(n)

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility
programme.desc: Charity Wakefield and Hattie Morahan lead the cast in Andrew Davies's adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel about a voyage of sexual and romantic discovery. Following the death of her husband, Mrs Dashwood and her daughters are forced to give up their home and move to a small cottage in Devonshire. Elinor is disappointed to leave her old home after falling in love with Edward Ferrars, her sister-in-law's brother, but looks forward to a promised visit. Marianne quickly finds she has an admirer in Colonel Brandon but is swept of her feet by neighbour Willoughby.(n)

programme.title: Sense and Sensibility

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: Drama set in 17th-century Paris, following the adventures of the soldiers assigned to protect king and country. Young swordsman d'Artagnan arrives in Paris seeking out the man responsible for killing his father - a quest that brings him into conflict with one of the king's guards. But as he quickly discovers, when you take on one Musketeer, you take on them all. It's soon back to business when the swashbuckling heroes are ordered to find a missing soldier who was carrying important letters on behalf of King Louis, while the dastardly Cardinal Richelieu plots to increase his political power. Luke Pasqualino, Tom Burke, Howard Charles and Santiago Cabrera star as d'Artagnan, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, with Peter Capaldi as Richelieu. Based on the characters created by Alexandre Dumas.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Scientists, climbers and wildlife film-makers explore the rainforests of Guyana, a former British colony in South America. Cameraman Gordon Buchanan finds giant otters almost as large as he is, canopy expert Justine Evans observes a family of red howler monkeys, and biologist Steve Backshall probes a habitat below a massive waterfall where frogs and freshwater crabs happily co-exist.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: The team travels deeper into the Guyanan jungle and scorpions and poisonous centipedes enter the base camp. Gordon Buchanan discovers an animal is stealing supplies and Steve Backshall finds giant piranha and long-fanged sabretooth fish in the river. Meanwhile, George McGavin catches an enormous tarantula and the climbing team tries to scale a huge unclimbed mountain at the forest's edge.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reaches the summit of a table-top mountain, after climbing a vertical cliff face nearly as high as the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Dr George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan have to haul three boats and all their kit through the jungle after finding the rapids of the Rewa River impassable. At the end of the journey, George presents a report on the expedition to the President of Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Volcano
programme.desc: Scientists and wildlife film-makers led by Steve Backshall, George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan explore Mount Bosavi, a giant extinct volcano covered by thick and largely unexplored rainforest in New Guinea. With the help of trackers from a remote tribe, they search for rare creatures and species to find evidence that may help stop the area's trees being felled for timber. The nest of the world's smallest parrot, an unusual beetle and new types of frog, gecko and bat are among the team's first discoveries.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Volcano
programme.desc: The team pushes deeper into the rainforest on the tropical island of New Guinea, where cameraman Gordon Buchanan enlists the aid of local tribespeople to help him film birds of paradise performing their unusual courtship ritual. George McGavin has to contend with a giant crocodile, and Steve Backshall discovers a hidden network of caves never previously seen by humans.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Volcano
programme.desc: With the team's explorations of New Guinea drawing to a close, George McGavin visits an erupting volcano, where he encounters a rare bird that depends on the hot ash to survive. Back at the original site, Steve Backshall and Gordon Buchanan head deep into the crater and discover two new mammals - a giant rat and a tree-climbing marsupial.(n)

Cameraman Gordon Buchanan finds giant otters almost as large as he is, canopy expert Justine Evans observes a family of red howler monkeys, and biologist Steve Backshall probes a habitat below a massive waterfall where frogs and freshwater crabs happily co-exist.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: The team travels deeper into the Guyanan jungle and scorpions and poisonous centipedes enter the base camp. Gordon Buchanan discovers an animal is stealing supplies and Steve Backshall finds giant piranha and long-fanged sabretooth fish in the river. Meanwhile, George McGavin catches an enormous tarantula and the climbing team tries to scale a huge unclimbed mountain at the forest's edge.(n)

programme.title: Lost Land of the Jaguar
programme.desc: Steve Backshall reaches the summit of a table-top mountain, after climbing a vertical cliff face nearly as high as the Empire State Building. Meanwhile, Dr George McGavin and Gordon Buchanan have to haul three boats and all their kit through the jungle after finding the rapids of the Rewa River impassable. At the end of the journey, George presents a report on the expedition to the President of Guyana, Bharrat Jagdeo. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: At a German POW camp in WWII, an American lieutenant uses his law school experience to defend a black soldier accused of killing another prisoner. The trial is part of a senior officer's plan to launch an elaborate escape(n)

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

programme.title: The Condemned 2
programme.desc: In this WWE-produced sequel to the 2007 film Condemned, a bounty hunter (Randy Orton) must fight to stay alive as he plays in a publicly aired tournament where he must hunt down his opponents before they kill him first. Directed by Roel Reiné(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 1. Part 1 of 3. A McCoy is murdered by a Hatfield and a forbidden love affair begins at the start of the legendary Hatfield-McCoy family feud, which nearly brought the states of Kentucky and West Virginia to civil war in the 1880s(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 2. Part 2 of 3. The Hatfields seek revenge after one of theirs is murdered by a McCoy. When friends and neighbors join the fighting, West Virginia and Kentucky are brought to the brink of civil war(n)

programme.title: Hatfields & McCoys
programme.desc: Part 3. The Hatfields are forced deeper into the mountains; Johnse Hatfield eyes another McCoy woman; and the fighting between the two families peaks in a New Year's Day battle(n)

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A Great White shark menaces an outdoor water park that employs the grown son of a small-town police-officer who helped kill a shark that had been threatening their home town(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars in an excellent romantic comedy. A New York fashion designer must confront her southern past, and redneck husband, if she is to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: Hart's War
programme.desc: At a German POW camp in WWII, an American lieutenant uses his law school experience to defend a black soldier accused of killing another prisoner. The trial is part of a senior officer's plan to launch an elaborate escape(n)

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: Ben Gates is off on another thrilling treasure hunt in this action-packed sequel involving a missing page from John Wilkes Booth's diary, which leads to a globe-trotting race to find an ancient city of gold(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, a young Apatosaurus is swept away by a vicious river current and ends up far from home. He soon embarks on a journey to reunite with his family, and befriends a prehistoric human child along the way(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars in an excellent romantic comedy. A New York fashion designer must confront her southern past, and redneck husband, if she is to wed her new beau(n)

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: A critically acclaimed bittersweet human comedy set in deep south Louisiana, about a close-knit circle of friends whose lives come together around a beauty parlour. Sharing each other's strength and loyalty, six women survive the cycles of life, birth and death to emerge stronger, closer and still laughing(n)

programme.title: Surfer, Dude
programme.desc: Hands on a Hard Body director S.R. Bindler directs this wave-twisting tale of a soul-searching surfer (Matthew McConaughey) in the midst of an existential crisis. Steve Addington (McConaughey) is an herb-toking long-boarder with a keen sense of balance and a mellow outlook on life. Upon returning to his hometown of Malibu to spend the summer with old friends, Steve begins to sense that the good vibes he remembers as a boy have been hopelessly corrupted by the powers that be. When the earthen surfer is faced with the prospect of expanding into virtual-reality video games and reality television or risk being rendered irrelevant, he opts to keep riding the majestic Southern California waves rather than participate in this new digital reality. Fate seems to intercede, however, when the ocean simply ceases to produce any suitable waves. His finances dried up, his sponsored expense accounts suddenly canceled, and his friends flocking off to bluer pastures, the surfer without a wave suddenly realizes that he has but two choices in life: he can either sit tight and try to keep his sanity until the waves come rolling in again, or finally give in to the Man and his intoxicating world of artificial amusements. Perhaps with a little wisdom from his trusted manager (Woody Harrelson), his aging mentor (Scott Glenn), his guardian angel (Willie Nelson), and his newfound muse (Alexie Gilmore), Addington can somehow manage to maintain his mellow just long enough to put it all into perspective and get back to the basics(n)

programme.title: Let's Go to Prison
programme.desc: A habitual thief takes revenge on the judge who continually jails him, by framing his son and having him sent to the same prison as him(n)

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: An expert translates hieroglyphs on an ancient ring, which turn out to be a map to a portal to another world. The Army sends two men to pass through the stargate and report back what is on the other side(n)

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: Classic, Oscar-winning Western starring Gary Cooper as a marshal prepared to kill in order to defend his town from a murderous criminal heading his way on the midday train. Even without the support of his townspeople or his own wife, Cooper digs in, waiting out the heat and his own doubts for a high noon confrontation(n)

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: College senior, Luke McNamara, is invited to join a secret fraternity organisation called 'The Skulls'. At first he is excited by this prospect, but as time passes he realises that the group harbours some sinister secrets..(n)

programme.title: Drop Zone
programme.desc: Skydiving ace Ty Moncrief lands on federal buildings and steals files containing the names of undercover agents which he sells to drug barons. Pete Nessip is the marshal who takes to the air to bring him down(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon
programme.desc: Drama follows the plight of aspiring tennis-star Peter Colt, whose bad luck seems to manifest itself just about everywhere. Professionally, Peter is near the very bottom of the world tennis ranks, and personally, he can't find love despite his best efforts to do so. In a rare turn of events, however, Peter is chosen as a wildcard to play at Wimbledon, the tennis world's most prestigious competition. While there, he meets American Lizzie Bradbury, the "bad girl of tennis", and his confidence on and off the court improves tenfold as he falls in love with her. Driven by his newfound luck, Peter climbs to the top of the tournament at record speed, until he actually has a chance of winning the men's singles title. Will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to get the trophy?(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: The Bride has an epic showdown with her former boss and lover in the finale of Quentin Tarantino's stylised revenge saga(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Chicago: Homicide cop Spooner doesn't trust the robots that are part of human society. They're supposed to be harmless but Spooner's latest murder hunt unearths a frightening android conspiracy(n)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez, Ice Cube, Jon Voight. Action adventure about a documentary film crew's encounter with a terrifying 40ft snake. Searching the Amazon basin for a legendary tribe never before captured on film, the crew fall in with an eccentric boat captain who claims to know the tribe's whereabouts. But he turns out to be obsessed with a deadly anaconda said to inhabit the local waters, leading the film crew along with him into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Charged performances by Steve Howey and Mike Vogel kick-start this high-octane thrill ride about driven motorcycle-racing brothers competing against each other on the professional circuit. K.C. Carlyle (Howey) lands a lucrative sponsorship with a factory team, but younger brother Trip (Vogel), the better rider, must make his way as an independent "privateer." Real-life motocross star Tyler Evans has a cameo as himself. Directed by Steve Boyum. Cameron Richardson, Sophia Bush, Robert Carradine(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs goes into his favourite diner for a cup of coffee and finds himself staring down the barrel of a gun, forcing him to question choices he has made in the past and present. The action then flashes back a few days to when he and the rest of the team members were investigating the death of a petty officer on board USS Gentry, which has been undergoing repairs in dry dock. The 200th episode of the crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy captain wearing a colourful costume underneath his uniform is shot and killed in a flower shop, and further investigation reveals he was leading a double life as a masked vigilante. Vance brings in Tony's ex-fiancee, journalist Wendy Miller, who claims the victim had been trying to expose a scandal, and as the team pursues the case, a real-estate scam is uncovered. Guest starring Perrey Reeves (Entourage).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy reservist is found dead in his home with marks around his neck, and Gibbs and the team discover he was working on a highly classified case for the department of defence. The circumstances surrounding the man's demise lead the investigators to suspect someone was secretly trying to drive him insane, bringing them into contact with Samantha Ryan, the director of a division specialising in psychological warfare. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Chief petty officer Leland Wiley dies of a heart attack just as he is about to reveal information on elusive arms dealer Agah Bayar. The team discovers the cardiac arrest was caused by someone hacking into a computer monitoring Wiley's pacemaker and increasing his heart rate to 400bpm. Meanwhile, a probationary agent tries to impress Gibbs and win a place on his team. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with Tamer Hassan and Matt L Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Confidential files are leaked by an anonymous hacker, who threatens to release more unless the Navy agrees to renew a contract with a struggling shipbuilding firm. The Navy Secretary suspects the company's owner Philip Wickes is to blame, and asks NCIS to join forces with the PsyOps unit in an elaborate ruse to bring the culprit out of hiding. Meanwhile, Gibbs' colleagues begin to notice his attraction to his opposite number Samantha Ryan. Guest starring Jamie Lee Curtis.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine Sergeant is found dead in a national park, forcing Gibbs and his team to collaborate with Mounted Police Sergeant May Dawson to solve a string of related crimes.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Delilah is rushed to hospital when the stress of planning her wedding becomes too much for her. Meanwhile, the team investigates the unexplained death of a healthy petty officer.(n)

programme.title: Bull
programme.desc: JP Nunnelly seeks repayment for defending Benny at trial, and asks Bull to help her deal with a case involving a morally dubious computer cloud company.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane suspects an inside job when the team is called to a robbery at a jewellery store. After CCTV evidence confirms the involvement of a notorious safe-cracker, the agents discover he owed money to a professional criminal - but just when they think the case is closed, the business owner is taken hostage. Elsewhere, Van Pelt and Rigsby consider the future of their relationship. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The murder of a trainer at a baseball academy leads Cho, Lisbon and Jane to suspect the crime could have been motivated by money. The team learns his wife is sole beneficiary of a substantial life insurance payout, and his business partner stood to take the controlling share of their company - but a lack of evidence hampers the investigation - until the consultant follows a hunch. Jane also has a flashback when he is knocked out, leading him to remember working at a circus with his father. Guest starring Jude Ciccolella.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A couple are murdered on their way to a high-school reunion, prompting Patrick to investigate the untrustworthy characters at the event. He connects the incident to a past case of bullying, and when he notices that Rigsby bears a resemblance to one of the victims, he tries to lure the killer out with an audacious scheme. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney and Tim Kang.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The corpse of a media-relations officer is unearthed at the opening of a new development in Salter, Central Valley. Mayor Melba Shannon blames eco-terrorists for the murder, but the officers later uncover evidence suggesting she herself could be to blame. When Patrick Jane is kidnapped he puts his life in danger by revealing he knows the true identity of the gang's leader. Elsewhere, a reporter films a documentary about Lisbon's unit at CBI HQ. Guest starring Sharon Lawrence (NYPD Blue).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The body of a saleswoman is found in the boot of a car at a luxury showroom, and an autopsy reveals she was run over. As inquiries proceed, the agents begin to suspect her boyfriend is to blame, but Jane is unconvinced and tries to draw the real murderer out into the open - only to end up destroying a Lamborghini. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part one of two. Stan makes a complete mess of arranging a party for his boss - who responds by sending him to Saudi Arabia, where he and the family get an unwelcome taste of life overseas. American and Arabian social customs soon prove incompatible, and a gender war looms. With the voice of Patrick Stewart.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Part two of two. Stan begins to enjoy the power of living in a patriarchal culture, but the rest of the family members find it harder to become accustomed to Saudi Arabian life. Francine in particular struggles to adjust, and lands herself in trouble by staging a musical protest about gender roles.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter forms a neighbourhood-watch group, but is arrested and charged with a hate crime after shooting an intruder climbing into Cleveland's house.(n)

programme.title: American Dad

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter helps Joe to publish a book, but things get out of hand when he starts to take on the writing as well. Elsewhere, Brian begins an extreme exercise regime after experiencing a runner's high for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter and Lois go into business together, opening a cookie store. However, tensions rise when Peter devises his own way of attracting more customers. Adult animation, featuring the voices of Seth MacFarlane and Alex Borstein.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan takes Hayley to National Gun Association Land after being forced to spend more time with her - but the trip only highlights their differing opinions on weapon control. Meanwhile, Steve becomes convinced he is adopted.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve's book makes him famous, leading Stan to become a horrendously pushy `stage parent'. Acquiring an agent, the teenager leaves his family for a life of luxury. Comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian begins a new career as an estate agent after having cosmetic surgery, which gets him in trouble with Quagmire after encouraging his friend to buy a new property.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Brian and Peter go out on a mission to find a new Thanksgiving turkey after they drunkenly consume the whole bird the night before the holiday. Meanwhile, Chris decides to become the man of the house while his father is away.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine fakes an affair to impress the glamorous Ladybugs, but finds they are not the kind of people she wants to be associated with. Stan, however, is happier with his new companion. American animated comedy, with the voices of Wendy Schaal and Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Roger and Stan have a blazing argument and exchange lives when the ensuing fight causes a Freaky Friday situation, giving them an insight into each other's problems, responsibilities and relationships. Elsewhere, Steve plucks up the courage to ask a girl out.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter, Joe, Cleveland and Quagmire help throw Jesus an important birthday party after running into the Son of God at the Quahog Mall. Animation following the misadventures of America's disaster-prone Griffin family, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.sub-title: Stewie, Chris and Brian's Excellent Adventure.
programme.desc: Stewie and Brian use their time machine to help Chris pass his history test so he does not have to re-sit the whole year, but trouble ensues when the trio all get stuck in the past.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Francine opens her own muffin shop when Stan fails to support her professional ambitions, giving her husband a taste of life without a housewife. In a desperate move, the inept agent transfers Klaus's brain back into a human body, but soon realises he has made a huge mistake. Meanwhile, Steve becomes convinced he is a teen werewolf.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Stan seeks revenge for an embarrassing incident at a high-school prom, in which he was humiliated on the dancefloor. His chance arrives when he attends a reunion with former homecoming queen Francine, but is devastated to discover two missing ballot papers mean that his wife never officially secured the crown.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Vance's brother-in-law Michael Thomas is linked to the murder of a petty officer, and Gibbs is placed under pressure to clear the man's name. Meanwhile, a negative performance review leaves Tony feeling downhearted and he resolves to prove the assessment wrong by being less chatty while on duty. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon and Rocky Carroll.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine lieutenant's body falls from the sky and the team links the man's death to the disappearance of a Navy chaplain thought to have been kidnapped by rebels working with Colombian crime cartels. Ziva and Tony are dispatched to conduct a rescue operation and enlist the help of former Interpol agent Monique Lisson, while Gibbs discovers there was more to the chaplain's outreach mission than meets the eye. Crime drama, guest starring Karina Lombard (The L Word) and Jamie Lee Curtis (A Fish Called Wanda).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A fire crew discovers a man's body after putting out a raging blaze at a warehouse belonging to a Navy-contracted electronics company, and Gibbs recognises the victim as Carter Plimpton - a former member of an NCIS black-ops unit. Meanwhile, a member of the Baltimore police department helping with the case appears to have a grudge against Tony.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team's mission to track the arsonist targeting US Navy facilities appears to end in success when the man in question is killed by a thermite explosion on board the USS Brewer. Meanwhile, Abby studies evidence relating to fire-starter Bruce Johnson, who died when his car exploded, and discovers coded messages in his quarters that indicate he may have been working as part of a larger gang. Crime drama, starring Mark Harmon.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The investigators discover probationary agent Ned Dorneget has been bugged by Harper Dearing, the man behind a spate of arson attacks on US Navy vessels. A phone call from the man himself makes it clear he is out for revenge, and Sam Ryan has information as to the motive behind it. Guest starring Richard Schiff (The West Wing).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Cho is forced to revisit old haunts and confront his murky past as he investigates the fatal shooting of a reformed criminal who used to belong to the same gang as him. Helped by Jane, he visits the victim's workplace to question his employer - but uses such heavy-handed tactics that he finds himself facing the threat of a lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A talented chef is poisoned during a culinary competition at an exclusive restaurant. After quizzing the other contestants, Jane discovers one of them encouraged the victim, a recovering alcoholic, to relapse in a bid to sabotage his chances, and learns he was in debt to a loan shark. However, it later emerges that a jealous partner could be to blame. Crime drama, guest starring Dina Meyer.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A scientist contacts Jane for help after being exposed to a deadly virus, leaving her with only a short time to live. He rushes to the facility where she works and compiles a list of possible suspects, including her husband - but later discovers the security systems have been tampered with, letting anyone enter the lab. It then emerges that a flask containing the toxin has been emptied in the staff room, threatening the entire team. Crime drama, guest starring Tony Curran (This Life).(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The discovery of a dead English tutor leads the team to uncover a plot to steal a priceless artefact from the British Museum, but the case is complicated by the appearance of a rogue police inspector from Scotland Yard. Lisbon also finds herself in the firing line when new CBI boss Madeleine Hightower holds her responsible for Jane's unconventional behaviour. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Aunjanue Ellis.(n)

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia is found stumbling out of a Native American reservation with severe head injuries, leading the agents to discover three dead bodies. They conclude she was the intended fourth victim but managed to escape, so Jane uses post-hypnotic suggestion on her to try to flush out the killer. Elsewhere, Hightower gives Rigsby and Van Pelt an ultimatum. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker.(n)

programme.title: Bull

In order to keep Trent out of harm's way and solve the case behind the killing that Trent saw, the two have no choice but to go undercover at an all-girls performing arts school, with Malcolm posing as the titular rotund old lady, Big Momma, and Trent dressing up as a heavy female student named Charmaine(n)

programme.desc: Dude, Where's My Ranch?. The Simpsons head to a cowboy ranch where Lisa finds love with an older boy. Meanwhile, Homer takes on the ferocious beavers who have damned a river and kept the Native Indians from their land. David Byrne and Jonathan Taylor Thomas guest star(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Dangerous Curves. Homer and Marge drive away to log cabin for the weekend and start reminscing about their early courtship. They flashback to 20 years ago when a newly-married Ned and Maude tried to keep them apart and also later in their married life when they both felt tempted to cheat on each other(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Fland Canyon. Homer recalls a dysfunctional Simpson-family holiday to the Grand Canyon with the practically perfect Flanders family that turned into a memorable bonding experience(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: With mutants and their human allies under threat, the X-Men send Wolverine back to the 70s to change their fate(n)

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: With mutants and their human allies under threat, the X-Men send Wolverine back to the 70s to change their fate(n)

programme.title: Gideon of Scotland Yard
programme.desc: Police inspector George Gideon experiences an eventful day's work. He learns one of his detectives has accepted bribes, goes on the trail of a murderous maniac and tracks a woman suspected of robbery. He also helps foil a bank heist and gets off on the wrong foot with an eager young constable. John Ford's drama, starring Jack Hawkins, Dianne Foster, Anna Lee and Anna Massey.(n)

programme.title: School of Rock
programme.desc: A slobbish guitarist dreams of stardom, but his hopes are dashed when the other members of his band kick him out. Struggling to make ends meet, he takes a job as a supply teacher at an exclusive private school, and sets about moulding his pupils into rock gods. Comedy from director Richard Linklater, starring Jack Black, Joan Cusack, Mike White and Sarah Silverman.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Nurse
programme.desc: The patients on the men's ward of Haven Hospital cause more mayhem for the staff than the rest of the hospital combined, forcing the management to send in a formidable matron to control the situation. Feeling aggrieved by her no-nonsense methods, the chaps decide the time is right to get their own back. Comedy, with Kenneth Williams, Hattie Jacques, Joan Sims, Kenneth Connor, Charles Hawtrey, Shirley Eaton and Leslie Phillips.(n)

programme.title: Night at the Museum
programme.desc: A new nightwatchman at New York's Museum of Natural History discovers his job entails more than he bargained for. Once night falls, an ancient Egyptian spell brings the museum exhibits to life, entangling him in a riotous struggle to restore peace and order before the sun rises and visitors arrive. Fantasy comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Dick Van Dyke, Robin Williams, Carla Gugino and Ricky Gervais.(n)

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A driverless train carrying a deadly cargo of toxic chemicals goes out of control. A veteran train operator and his rookie colleague set off in pursuit in their own locomotive, intending to bring it to a halt before it crashes and causes a major disaster. Action thriller, the final film from director Tony Scott, starring Denzel Washington, Chris Pine and Rosario Dawson.(n)

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Former CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his squad of retired operatives for a vital mission. A devastatingly powerful new weapon has been stolen, and it falls to Frank's team to retrieve it - which means facing lethal assassins, terrorists and corrupt government officials out to steal the device. Action thriller sequel, starring Bruce Willis, Helen Mirren and John Malkovich.(n)

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: The Archangel Michael turns his back on Heaven and travels to a small-town diner to protect a pregnant waitress and her unborn child from God's wrath. Action fantasy, starring Paul Bettany, Dennis Quaid, Lucas Black, Tyrese Gibson, Adrianne Palicki and Willa Holland.(n)

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.(n)

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: A misunderstood boy is able to communicate with ghosts haunting his neighbourhood, but no one else believes they exist. When a curse placed on the town by a witch centuries ago causes zombies to rise from the grave, it falls to the youngster to avert disaster. Animated adventure, with the voices of Kodi Smit-McPhee and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: A teenager discovers he is the last in a long line of warriors destined to defend the world from dark forces. His duty now is to embark on a perilous journey through time to recover the six parts of a powerful mystical artefact and ensure it is returned to safe hands. Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane.(n)

programme.title: Epic
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into a forest that her scientist father believes is home to a race of miniature people. She stumbles on the tiny creatures and is shrunk down to their size so she can carry out a quest to save their new queen from an invading army. Animated adventure, with the voices of Amanda Seyfried, Josh Hutcherson, Colin Farrell and Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Vice Versa
programme.desc: A department store executive returns from a trip to Thailand in possession of a mysterious artefact that causes him to change places with his 11-year-old son. While the horrified father struggles to cope with a world of teachers and school bullies, the youngster is revelling in the perks of being a grown-up. Fantasy comedy, starring Judge Reinhold, Fred Savage, Swoosie Kurtz and Corinne Bohrer.(n)

programme.title: Ride Along
programme.desc: A wannabe police officer persuades his girlfriend's tough detective brother to take him along on duty. The cop hopes to scare his unwanted partner away from his sister by exposing him to danger - but needs some help when the patrol leads to a run-in with the city's most wanted criminal. Comedy, starring Ice Cube, Kevin Hart and Laurence Fishburne.(n)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Premiere. An expert takes a contract from the CIA to test a maximum security prison by trying to break out of it , but he soon discovers he has been duped and that his captors intend him to stay inside forever. He hatches a plan to escape, but to succeed he will need the help of a long-term convict - who wants his own freedom in return for assistance. Thriller, with Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger.(n)

programme.title: Oldboy
programme.desc: A man is kidnapped and held hostage for 20 years, until one day he is mysteriously released. Determined to avenge himself on his captors, he investigates a web of sinister conspiracies to discover who it was that imprisoned him and why. Spike Lee's remake of the Korean thriller, starring Josh Brolin, Elizabeth Olsen and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten makes salmon and guacamole sandwiches, plus salted caramel brownies for dessert.(n)

programme.desc: Ina Garten learns from food experts in New York, as she undertakes a smoked salmon and bagel masterclass at a Jewish store and learns about steak from a renowned butcher.(n)

programme.desc: The chef visits a shop renowned for their signature `smash meatball' sandwich, and meets a friend for a fondue.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.desc: Recipes for Indian dish Mulligatawny soup, Thai beef with peppers, and an Italian meal, chicken piccata and buttery lemon parsley noodles.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummond makes an Italian meatloaf, and a no-bake mac and four cheeses, served with a simple green salad, before preparing slice cookies and ice cream sundaes.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree prepares strawberry lemonade and scalloped potatoes and ham with a side of lemony green beans for the family.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver rustles up more simple dishes using home-grown produce. He is joined by a Welsh sheep farmer who tackles common misconceptions about lamb and explains how the conditions the animals are kept in affects the quality of the meat.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares recipes using leeks, including pappardelle and a `concertina' squid dish. He also explains why the underrated vegetables can be a real asset in the kitchen and offers advice on how to grow and store them.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef serves simple recipes using winter vegetables grown in his Essex garden. He prepares a seasonal coleslaw and bubble and squeak, and uses homegrown cabbage to make an Italian soup.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver turns his attention to recipes using furred game, including rabbit - once a staple on Britain's dinner tables - fed on the best vegetables from the chef's garden. He demonstrates how to prepare his own Essex fried rabbit, along with free-range venison and a pearl barley ragu.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates the versatility of pastry as he prepares a variety of sweet and savoury recipes using pastry along with home-grown fruit and vegetables from his Essex garden. The chef shows how to create an Italian ham, nettle and spinach tart, a pie made with steak, Guinness and cheese, plus a traditional apple and blackberry pie.(n)

programme.title: Jamie and Jimmy's Friday Night Feast
programme.desc: This week, Jamie Oliver and Jimmy Doherty welcome chart-topping singer-songwriter Ellie Goulding to their pop-up cafe on Southend Pier, as their guest relives the junk food of her past by giving a burger a vegan twist. Jamie prepares an indulgent Japanese pork belly ramen, while Jimmy continues his mission to create a range of food with his DIY builds, reinventing the humble roast chicken with his own rotisserie. Plus, the boys revive a medieval tradition which was used to tackle the problem of farm waste.(n)

programme.desc: Ree Drummond tours a local kitchen store while gathering some favourite tools for a wedding gift. As she gathers the goodies, she shares the great dishes she'll make with each.(n)

programme.desc: Jamie Oliver turns his attention to dishes using eggs collected from his hand-reared free-range hens. programme.title: Jamie at Home

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: The chef reveals three simple ways to cook and dress asparagus, and demonstrates how best to use the vegetable in a meal. Gardener Brian also explains that once established, asparagus practically takes care of itself and can last for up to 20 years.(n)

programme.title: Jamie at Home
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to produce home-grown summer salads in even the most confined garden plot. He also offers advice on the basic principles of dressings, and shows how simple green leaves can form the basis of a roasted peach and bresaola salad with feta and yoghurt.(n)
