programme.title: Rosemary's Baby
programme.desc: A young woman living in an old apartment building becomes pregnant following a horrible nightmare, and begins to fear the worst for her unborn child while suspecting that she is surrounded by evil(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: Ethan and Joel Coen's Oscar-laden thriller stars Josh Brolin as Llewelyn Moss, a trailer-dwelling welder and hunter. Hunting deer in the desert, he comes across a drugs exchange which has gone bloodily wrong, and among the detritus is a case containing $2m. He decides to appropriate the money but ends up with the deadly assassin Anton Chigurh on his trail, as well as Sheriff Ed Tom Bell, and smiling bounty hunter Carson Wells. As Moss tries to keep hold of the money, and preserve both his own life and that of his wife Carla, a deadly game of cat-and-mouse is played out across the Tex-Mex border as pursuers and the pursued try to gain the upper hand. In English and Spanish with English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A decorated Vietnam veteran becomes a local hero after standing up to a pair of skinheads on a transit bus, and he later takes the law into his own hands after the police fail to investigate the brutal murder of his best friend. When Frank Vega (Danny Trejo) returned home from fighting for his country, he should have been hailed as a hero. Instead, he drifted into the margins of society after failing to find a job and being abandoned by his high-school sweetheart. Decades later, when Frank sees a pair of skinheads harassing an elderly black man on a city bus, he knocks them both out as the incident is captured on video. An instant viral hit, the widely circulated video turns Frank into an Internet celebrity. But his fame comes at a high price when his best friend Klondike is killed and authorities sweep the murder under the rug. Meanwhile, Frank's biggest battle is yet to come. Ron Perlman and Charles S. Dutton co-star(n)

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: Bounty hunter John "The Hangman" Ruth (Kurt Russell) and his dangerous prisoner Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh) encounter a treacherous blizzard en route to her sentencing in Wyoming. During their stagecoach ride they come across another bounty hunter, Major Marquis Warren (Samuel L. Jackson), and former Confederate rebel leader Chris Mannix (Walton Goggins). Seeking refuge from the weather, the group chart a course for a mountain cabin to wait out the storm. There, they meet four other traveling strangers (Tim Roth, Demián Bichir, Michael Madsen, and Bruce Dern) with whom they must share the stuffy confines until the end of the blizzard. Tensions eventually boil over as each individual has his or her own agenda in this inventive Western, which is set in the aftermath of the American Civil War and written and directed by Quentin Tarantino(n)

In order to get back in fighting shape, he works with a hardened trainer at a run-down gym(n)

programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who was unjustly imprisoned for murder and served more than two decades before winning his freedom(n)

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: Kathryn Bigelow's compelling fact-based, Iraq-set bomb disposal drama was scripted by journalist Mark Boal, drawing on his experiences while embedded with a United States Army Explosive Ordnance Disposal team in 2004. The focus is on the complex characters making up Bravo Company, who disable and destroy improvised explosive devices. The days are ticking down to the end of the bomb squad's tour, but their role puts the team in harm's way around the clock. And it doesn't help that one of the team is addicted to risk taking and pays scant attention to standard procedure, putting other lives in danger, as well as his own. The Hurt Locker provides a tense glimpse into the lives of these extraordinary men, and also probes the various psychologies of people whose job could kill them at any moment, as well as - briefly - exploring how they cope once away from their adrenaline-soaked vocation(n)

He turns to his lost love for help in finding her, but the search forces him to confront his own dark past as a former member of the military police. Thriller, starring Alexander Siddig, Joshua Jackson and Marisa Tomei.(n)

programme.desc: A military detective is called in to investigate the murder and rape of the daughter of a top-ranking general. However, as he sets about solving the case, he unravels a web of personal betrayal and apparent cover-ups - and suspects the army has a vested interest in suppressing the truth. Mystery thriller, starring John Travolta, Madeleine Stowe, James Cromwell and Timothy Hutton.(n)

programme.desc: To Protect and to (Over) Serve. A detective-turned-bar owner in Philadelphia gets some help from Jon(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.sub-title: The Perks of Being a Wallpaper
programme.desc: The Perks of Being a Wallpaper. In the Season 5 premiere, Jon tackles a Las Vegas dive bar on the verge of closing due to an owner accused of being too nice(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Bikini Bust. Jon Taffer is in California attempting to turn around the fortunes of a bar called Extremes, which trades on the good looks and skimpy outfits of its waiting staff. However, the bar is less than a month from closing its doors and Jon discovers that the owner may be too fond of his own product. He tries to turn the place around by taking a good look at the staff's work ethic, the drinks menu and the bar's reputation(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A Dash of Bitters. A rescue turns testy when Taffer enlists the help of the bar owner's ex-wife and former manager(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Schmuck Dynasty. Jon helps a Staten Island, N.Y., bar that's being overrun by its customers(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Mandala Down. A self-proclaimed nightlife expert burdened by mounting debt butts heads with Jon as he offers his help(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Muscle Madness. Two muscle-bound managers at a Houston establishment get Jon's help in mending their friendship(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Loose Lips Loose Tips. Four bickering Irish sisters and their San Francisco bar get some assistance from Jon(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Swinging From the Rafters. A lakeside bar's owner displays a lack of management that causes Taffer to step away until the owner can face reality(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Back to the Bar: Meathead-to-Head. Jon revisits the Dirty Rooster and moderates a dispute between two rival bar owners in Houston(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Twin vs. Twin. A sibling rivalry between two identical twins presents Jon with a challenging rescue(n)

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Bro's Got to Geaux. Jon schools the owner of a beat-up college bar with a reputation for serving underage drinkers(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Terry Gilliam's film stars Johnny Depp as Raoul Duke (a thinly disguised Thompson) and Benicio Del Toro as his companion Dr. Gonzo en route to Las Vegas to report on a convention of district attorneys, fuelled only by a collection of almost every illegal drug going and enough booze to float a battleship(n)

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Joaquin Phoenix plays Johnny Cash, and Oscar-winner Reese Witherspoon plays June Carter in James Mangold's acclaimed biographical film about country music's legendary 'Man in Black'. The film follows Cash from his childhood, where he was touched by tragedy, through his years on the road to his marriage to June Carter, who was country royalty (having been a part of the massively influential Carter Family band), and their struggle to find happiness as she weans him off booze and drugs. Walk the Line is a warts-and-all biopic, showing Cash's faults as well as his undoubted star quality as one of the greatest singer/songwriters that America has ever produced(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Every Christmas Eve for the last decade, best friends Isaac (Seth Rogen), Ethan (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), and Chris (Anthony Mackie) have reunited for a wild night on the town in New York City. But since the guys are getting older and have to face new responsibilities, their tradition is about to come to an end. As a result, they plan one last epic night together, which includes finding their way to a legendary party called the Nutcracka Ball. Lizzy Caplan, Miley Cyrus, Mindy Kaling, Jillian Bell, and Michael Shannon co-star. Directed by Jonathan Levine(n)

programme.title: Wet Hot American Summer
programme.desc: 1980s teen comedies finally get the parody they so richly deserve with Wet Hot American Summer, the first feature film from writer/director David Wain and co-screenwriter Michael Showalter, formerly of the sketch comedy troupe the State. It's the last day of the summer season at Camp Firewood, and as camp director Beth (Janeane Garofalo) prepares to wrap things up, the staff of teenage counselors realize this is their last chance to do something about the summer romances that have been brewing for the past three months. Sweet but shy Coop (Michael Showalter) is crazy about pretty Katie (Marguerite Moreau), but there's the problem of her severely moody boyfriend Andy (Paul Rudd). Meanwhile, Victor (Ken Marino) is trying to score with sexy Abby (Marisa Ryan), who is known to make friends easily, and McKinley (Michael Ian Black) and Ben (Bradley Cooper) attempt to keep their hot and heavy relationship a secret. Meanwhile, arts and crafts teacher Gail (Molly Shannon) turns to her students for comfort as her marriage falls apart, drama coach Susie (Amy Poehler) tries to whip the talent show into shape with Ben's help, and camp chef Gene (Christopher Meloni) deals with his unique sexual quirks with the help of a talking can of vegetables (voiced by H. Jon Benjamin). Beth even finds time for romance with socially inept astrophysicist Henry (David Hyde Pierce), but first Henry has to save Camp Firewood from a large piece of space junk about to re-enter Earth's atmosphere. Like Wain and Showalter, Ken Marino, Michael Ian Black, and Joe Lo Truglio (who appears in a small role) were also members of the State; fellow State alumnus Kerri Kenney was cast in a supporting role in the film, but her character didn't appear in the final cut(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: A gang of campus misfits clashes with many different militant groups(n)

programme.title: Wild Hogs
programme.desc: A mismatched group of bored suburbanites longing to escape the stress of their daily lives and embrace the freedom of the open road finds that it takes more than polished chrome and leather jackets to truly experience the biker lifestyle in this revved-up road comedy starring John Travolta, Tim Allen, Martin Lawrence, and William H. Macy. Upon trading the comfort of their couches for the thunderous rumble of two-wheeled street machines, these four adventurous riders cross paths with the notorious Del Fuegos -- an authentic biker gang that doesn't take kindly to the weekend warrior type(n)

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: An aging rocker discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon, which inspires him to give up his hard-living ways and reconnect with his estranged son(n)

programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Nick Hornby's acclaimed memoir about one man's struggle to balance his love of a woman and his love for soccer was the basis of a well-reviewed British film in 1997, and now gets a Americanized rewrite with this picture, in which the game is changed from soccer to baseball. Ben (Jimmy Fallon) is a high-school teacher who meets Lindsay (Drew Barrymore), who has a successful career in business. Ben and Lindsay don't appear to have much in common on the surface, but they hit it off and are soon involved in a serious romance. But when spring rolls around, Lindsay becomes aware of the true love of Ben's life -- the Boston Red Sox. Despite the team's lamentable record, Ben has been a fiercely loyal Red Sox fan since childhood, and Lindsay finds it hard to compete with his passion for baseball, while Ben is forced to choose between the obsessions of his youth and the enthusiasms of a responsible adult. Fever Pitch was shot in part in Boston during the 2004 baseball season, which to the surprise of the filmmakers saw the Red Sox winning baseball's world series for the first time since 1918(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: A successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realises that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.desc: A gang of campus misfits clashes with many different militant groups(n)

programme.title: Danny Collins
programme.desc: An aging rocker discovers a 40-year-old letter written to him by John Lennon, which inspires him to give up his hard-living ways and reconnect with his estranged son(n)

programme.title: For Love of the Game
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a washed-up baseball player who, on the morning of the final game of the season, finds out that his girlfriend is leaving to live in London and his team's new owners plan to trade him. As he pitches for the last time, he is torn - in a series of flashbacks - between the game he adores and the woman he loves(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: A TV reporter and her cameraman, while on assignment, get confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious secret. A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC"(n)

programme.title: William Shakespeare's 'Romeo & Juliet'
programme.desc: Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: Old Curses. Lizzie battles new demons and old curses, while a final confrontation with the pretender exposes King Henry's weaknesses(n)

programme.title: The Family Stone
programme.desc: A woman meets her future in-laws and discovers they don't much care for her in this comedy from writer and director Thomas Bezucha. Everett Stone (Dermot Mulroney) is a successful young businessman who is dating Meredith Morton (Sarah Jessica Parker), and has asked her to spend Christmas with his family, with plans to ask his mother, Sybil (Diane Keaton), for the titular family wedding band and propose to Meredith on Christmas Day. Meredith is more than a bit nervous about meeting Everett's folks, and things only get worse when they arrive -- Meredith is by her nature straight-laced and a bit uptight around strangers, while Sybil and family patriarch Kelly (Craig T. Nelson) are free-thinkers who, except for Everett, have raised a family of cheerfully rebellious children, most notably younger daughter Amy (Rachel McAdams), older brother Ben (Luke Wilson), and adopted sibling Thad (Tyrone Giordano), who is both deaf and gay. Meredith and the Stone family do not get along well at first, especially Sybil, who is appalled at the prospect of Everett giving Meredith the family's heirloom wedding ring; in dire need of moral support, Meredith asks her younger sister, Julie (Claire Danes), to join her for Christmas with the Stones. However, the plan runs into a snag when Everett's head is turned by pretty Julie, and Meredith finds herself on the receiving end of attention from slobby Ben(n)

programme.title: When the Bough Breaks
programme.desc: A married couple who are eager to have a baby hire a seemingly stable young woman to be their surrogate. However, the latter soon becomes infatuated with the husband, and is willing to do whatever it takes to seduce him(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: An overheard conversation leads a woman into a dark world of deadly intrigue in this political thriller. Silvia Broome (Nicole Kidman) is an African émigré who works as an interpreter at the United Nations. One of the languages she understands is Ku, a dialect spoken in her home country of Matobo. One day, as the General Assembly auditorium is being evacuated for a routine security sweep, Broome overhears a man speaking in Ku, who makes a cryptic statement that could be interpreted as a threat against the life of Zuwanie (Earl Cameron), Matobo's controversial ruler. Secret Service agent Tobin Keller (Sean Penn) is brought in to investigate Broome's story, and it isn't long before he's convinced that she knows more than she's willing to tell. As Keller and his partner, Dot Woods (Catherine Keener), dig deeper into Broome's story as well as her past, they discover a shocking tale of violence and corruption tied to Zuwanie's regime. The Interpreter was directed by Sydney Pollack, who also appears in a brief supporting role(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Bonkers comedy with Adam Sandler as an Israeli commando who fakes his own death so he can become a New York hairdresser, only to be hunted down by nemesis John Turturro(n)

programme.title: 88 Minutes
programme.desc: College professor Jack Gramm races to prove a man he testified against deserves to be on Death Row, saving his own life in the process(n)

Thriller, based on a true story. A brilliant young mathematician is recruited by his professor (Kevin Spacey) to join a crack team of students whose system of card-counting is enabling them to win millions from the casinos of Las Vegas. How long can their winning streak last, however, once a suspicious head of casino security (Laurence Fishburne) makes it his mission to bring an end to their forbidden activities?(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Every Christmas Eve for the last decade, best friends Isaac (Seth Rogen), Ethan (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), and Chris (Anthony Mackie) have reunited for a wild night on the town in New York City. But since the guys are getting older and have to face new responsibilities, their tradition is about to come to an end. As a result, they plan one last epic night together, which includes finding their way to a legendary party called the Nutcracka Ball. Lizzy Caplan, Miley Cyrus, Mindy Kaling, Jillian Bell, and Michael Shannon co-star. Directed by Jonathan Levine(n)

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Steve Martin plays Bobby Bowfinger, a would-be movie producer and charlatan who desperately needs a hit film to repay his debts. Bringing together a cast of oddballs, he dupes superstar actor Eddie Murphy into starring in his low-budget picture(n)

programme.desc: In this fascinating drama set in 1932 and based on actual events, Irish political activist Jimmy Gralton reopens a community hall in his hometown with the help of the locals. However, he faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Down the Shore
programme.desc: A sleepy coastal town gets a jolt when downbeat amusement park attendant James Gandolfini gets an unexpected visitor. Drama with Famke Janssen. Strong language/mature themes(n)

programme.title: Under the Same Moon
programme.desc: A galaxy of Spanish-language television stars do what they do best in this timely tearjerker about illegal immigration. A 9-year-old Mexican boy (Adrian Alonso) embarks on a dangerous border-crossing adventure in hopes of reuniting with his mother (Kate del Castillo), an undocumented immigrant working as a domestic in L.A. Carmen Salinas and America Ferrera ("Ugly Betty") costar(n)

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape
programme.desc: A loner cares for his dysfunctional family, including a mentally disabled brother and their reclusive, obese mother, who has not left the house in seven years(n)

programme.title: Jimmy's Hall
programme.desc: In this fascinating drama set in 1932 and based on actual events, Irish political activist Jimmy Gralton reopens a community hall in his hometown with the help of the locals. However, he faces opposition from both the government and a crotchety priest, who suspect the hall is a hotbed for loose morals and communist activity(n)

programme.title: Basquiat
programme.desc: Basquiat tells the story of the meteoric rise of youthful artist Jean-Michel Basquiat who starting out his career as a street artist(n)

programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Irish playwright Martin McDonagh brings crackling dialogue and pitch-black humour to this tale about hit men laying low after a botched job. Exiled to picturesque Bruges, Belgium, partners Ken and Ray kill time in pubs, museums and medieval churches while awaiting word from their sociopathic boss. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

programme.title: Henry Poole Is Here
programme.desc: Divine, Capra-esque comedy-drama starring Luke Wilson as a depressed man who moves into a run-down, suburban L.A. neighborhood hoping for some peace and quiet, but his well-meaning, religious neighbors think otherwise. When one of them spots the outline of a holy being on his stucco wall, his sanctuary turns into a blessed site to which people from miles around flock, looking for miracles. Radha Mitchell, Adriana Barraza, George Lopez, Cheryl Hines, Morgan Lily. Directed by Mark Pellington(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this poignant adaptation of author Phoebe Gloeckner's acclaimed graphic novel of the same name, Minnie Goetze (Bel Powley), a sexually precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to grasp the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend (Alexander Skarsgård). Her newly awakened sexuality manifests itself in a series of encounters with boys at school which she painstakenly recounts her diary. Kristen Wiig, Christopher Meloni, Austin Lyon and Quinn Nagle co-star. Directed by Marielle Heller(n)

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convict (Edward Norton) attempts to exploit his parole officer's (Robert De Niro) marital discord to gain early release(n)

programme.title: Fight Club
programme.desc: Brad Pitt and Edward Norton duke it out in this stylish and provocative social satire. Norton plays a frustrated white-collar worker who joins a brutal club led by Tyler (Pitt) whose members relieve their aggression by beating each other to a pulp. Directed by David Fincher. Helena Bonham Carter, Meat Loaf Aday(n)

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Jude Law and Uma Thurman star in this slick vision of a cold, sterile, genetically perfect future. Can one man hide his flawed humanity and realise his life's dream?(n)

programme.desc: Basquiat tells the story of the meteoric rise of youthful artist Jean-Michel Basquiat who starting out his career as a street artist(n)

programme.title: W.
programme.desc: The story of George W. Bush traces the US President's rise to power from a privileged alcoholic to a born-again Christian whose belief in religious destiny helped move him to the top ranks of political power(n)

programme.title: The Pope of Greenwich Village
programme.desc: A funny, high-voltage story of two small-time thieves after a big score in New York's Little Italy(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: A dark secret drives Ben Thomas to acts of incredible self-sacrifice. But why is he so compelled to put his life at risk?(n)

programme.title: Gattaca
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Jude Law and Uma Thurman star in this slick vision of a cold, sterile, genetically perfect future. Can one man hide his flawed humanity and realise his life's dream?(n)

programme.title: Our Little Sister
programme.desc: At their estranged father's funeral, three twentysomething siblings learn that they have a teenage half sister, and invite her to live with them in the seaside town of Kamakura(n)

programme.title: Hysteria
programme.desc: Set in Victorian London, Tanya Wexler's period comedy Hysteria tells the tale of Mortimer Granville (Hugh Dancy), a young doctor disturbed by the way most hospitals ignore the latest research on germ theory, and still treat patients with bleedings and leeches. After being fired from his most recent job for speaking out on the matter, he ends up in the employ of Dr. Robert Dalrymple (Jonathan Pryce) who runs a private practice specializing in treating women who suffer from "hysteria" and come to the doctor for his precise digital manipulations in order to get a release. With the help of Mortimer's best friend Edmund (Rupert Everett) together they create a device that allows these women to achieve the desired result much more quickly. Complicating matters, Mortimer becomes enamored of Dalrymple's strong-willed, feminist-minded daughter Charlotte (Maggie Gyllenhaal). Hysteria played at the 2011 Toronto International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: When a priceless Monet painting is stolen from the Metropolitan Museum of Art, the police find themselves wondering which world-class art thief pulled the job. What they don't know is that the thief wasn't a professional, but an amateur. Thomas Crown (Pierce Brosnan) was born poor but made his way through Oxford on a boxing scholarship. With his sharp sense for business and ruthless ambition, Crown has become a self-made billionaire; but despite his wealth and power, he still seeks new challenges, and he steals art not for the profits but for the sheer excitement. However, as fun as art theft might be, it's still illegal, and investigator Catherine Banning (Rene Russo) is brought in to track down the culprit. Certain clues point to Crown, so Banning introduces herself into Crown's social circle. Police detective Michael McCann (Denis Leary) warns Banning against getting too close to Crown. She takes McCann's suggestion lightly -- until she finds herself falling for the suave thief. The Thomas Crown Affair was adapted from the popular 1968 caper film of the same name starring Steve McQueen and Faye Dunaway; Dunaway appears in the new film as Crown's analyst(n)

programme.title: The Great Raid
programme.desc: One of the greatest rescue missions of all time gets an estimable treatment in this faithful, thrilling account of a daring operation to free more than 500 Allied POWs from their Japanese captors at Cabanatuan in the Philippines in 1945. Benjamin Bratt, James Franco, Joseph Fiennes, Connie Nielsen, Freddie Joe Farnsworth, Mark Consuelos, Natalie Mendoza, Robert Mammone, Max Martini(n)

programme.title: Seven Pounds
programme.desc: A dark secret drives Ben Thomas to acts of incredible self-sacrifice. But why is he so compelled to put his life at risk?(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn's Finest
programme.desc: Training Day director Antoine Fuqua takes viewers on a dark ride through the streets of Brooklyn, following three New York Police officers as they wrestle with temptation, loyalty, and duty while attempting to uphold the law and deal with the pressures of the job. Eddie Dugan (Richard Gere) is days away from retirement, but he's been burnt-out for years. Unable to remember why he signed up for the job in the first place, all Eddie can think about is retreating to his fishing cabin in Connecticut, and forgetting the horrors that he's seen during his decades on the job. At the same time, undercover narcotics cop Clarence "Tango" Butler (Don Cheadle) is right in the thick of it. As hard as he tries to quit, however, his superiors always find a way of keeping him on the job. Much like Dugan, he's lost sight of his priorities, and these days Tango's loyalties seem to lie more with notorious inner-city drug dealer Caz (Wesley Snipes) than with the boys in blue. And Tango isn't the only cop who's being drawn to the dark side of the law; narcotics officer Sal Procida's (Ethan Hawke) wife is currently pregnant with twins, and he's barely making enough to keep his family afloat. When Sal learns that his wife is at risk of losing their unborn children, desperation drives him to consider unethical means of ensuring financial stability. In seven days, the lives of all three officers will converge at one crime scene as the NYPD attempts to clean up the BK projects, the epicenter of lawlessness in the highest-crime precinct(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimsby
programme.desc: A working-class British soccer hooligan discovers that his long-lost brother is now a well-mannered superspy. When their reunion at a charity event causes the latter to botch a crucial mission, the two men must team up to defeat a terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: Hairbrained
programme.desc: When an eccentric teenage prodigy is accepted into college he finds himself an outcast, but strikes up an unlikely friendship with a mature student harbouring a gambling problem. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Howard the Duck
programme.desc: Director and co-screenwriter Willard Huyck has taken Steve Garber's abrasive, beer-drinking and cigar-smoking comic-book character and castrated him, turning him into a wide-eyed cutesy-pie available for the toy shelves. Huyck's Howard the Duck is a being from outer space, blown into Cleveland by an errant laser beam. After a few minutes on Earth, Howard runs into rock singer Beverly Switzler (Lea Thompson), and they become fast friends after Howard protects her from a couple of nasty punkers. The film then degenerates into an extended chase, as Howard and Beverly are pursued by government agents who want to capture Howard before he can be beamed back into space(n)

programme.title: Back to School
programme.desc: Comedy about a millionaire who goes back to college with his son to show him why and how he should experience the student lifestyle, by throwing the best parties and knowing the right people(n)

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Unless he comes up with $50,000, Peter and his Average Joe's Gym will be swallowed up by White Goodman's bodybuilding empire. His only chance is to take a team of no-hopers to the national dodgeball finals, and a bruising showdown with White. Anarchic comedy(n)

programme.desc: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married(n)

programme.desc: A woman whose husband is cheating on her and an undertaker who's in love with her for ages, decide to fake her death so they can be together. However, the other town's undertaker who loves over-the-top funerals complicates things(n)

programme.desc: A burglar been forced to steal the Da Vinci art to ruin the world's economy(n)

programme.title: Operation: Endgame
programme.desc: In this edgy action-comedy, a new recruit (Joe Anderson) joins an elite gang of assassins charged with protecting the U.S., and he must fight to stay alive when his first day on the job finds him responsible for eliminating a traitor within their ranks(n)

programme.title: Out to Sea
programme.desc: Lighthearted comedy in which an inveterate gambler dupes his widower brother-in-law into joining him on a cruise, where he hopes to fleece eligible women. However, the latter soon discovers that there is more to the whole affair than meets the eye. Lemmon and Matthau revive their long-standing partnership to great effect in a film that contains more than a few surprises(n)

programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist (John Krasinski) awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother (Margo Martindale) is diagnosed with a brain tumor. Directed by Krasinski, The Hollars made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival, and co-stars Anna Kendrick, Sharlto Copley, and Richard Jenkins(n)

programme.desc: After cheating on a test to win a promotion, Fred Flintstone becomes unwittingly involved in a prehistoric embezzlement scam(n)

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: After losing her inheritance, a socialite works as a nanny to a precocious 8-year-old(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mum's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: A mild-mannered single dad working as a security guard at a New Jersey mall has to save the day when a gang of thieves try to pull a big heist. Kevin James cowrote and stars in this hilarious farce(n)

programme.title: The Hollars
programme.desc: A frustrated cartoonist (John Krasinski) awaiting the birth of his first child is forced to reconnect with his dysfunctional family when his mother (Margo Martindale) is diagnosed with a brain tumor. Directed by Krasinski, The Hollars made its world premiere at the 2016 Sundance Film Festival, and co-stars Anna Kendrick, Sharlto Copley, and Richard Jenkins(n)

programme.title: Kissing a Fool
programme.desc: An egotistical television personality enlists the assistance of his best friend in putting the fidelity of his fiancee to the test in this amiable comedy of the sexes. Told in flashback, the film takes a familiar love-triangle scenario and gives it a bitter twist. With a bride who seems too good for either suitor, the film is sustained by one question - who will she choose?(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning romantic comedy-drama as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to 'act' in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar he bumps into Charlotte who has been left to her own devices while her husband, a successful photographer, is on an assignment. Two strangers in an unfamiliar city, they form a friendship that slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances(n)

programme.title: Private Parts
programme.desc: America's most controversial radio personality, 'shock-jock' Howard Stern, stars in this hysterical, semi- autobiographical movie. The film follows Howard's rise and rise, from his troubled childhood years to his college days and then onto his escalating celebrity as a national hero with a radio show that attracts more than 18 million listeners daily. Most of Stern's more infamous radio outbursts are included in the movie and there are cameo roles for the people who helped and hindered him along the way to becoming a legend. You may not have heard of him now, but by the end of the movie you'll be craving more of the phenomenon that is Howard Stern(n)

programme.title: Go
programme.desc: Three interconnected stories about youth in Los Angeles involved in sex, drugs, car theft and violence over 24 hours(n)

programme.title: The Way of the Gun
programme.desc: Christopher McQuarrie's (writer of The Usual Suspects) directorial debut stars Benicio Del Toro and Ryan Phillippe as a couple of small time crooks who decide to kidnap and ransom Juliette Lewis, surrogate mother of wealthy Scott Wilson. They figure he'll pay big but what they don't know are his connections which includes veteran 'cleaner' (James Caan), who knows all about finding and dealing with 'problems'(n)

programme.title: Music of the Heart
programme.desc: Meryl Streep portrays dedicated music teacher Roberta Guaspari, who tries to instill a love of the violin in a group of underprivileged kids(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: A 23rd-century New York City cabbie encounters a genetically engineered alien named Leeloo, who has the life force that can unite the planet's elements and stave off a raging fireball that's on a collision course with Earth(n)

programme.title: Miles Ahead
programme.desc: This free-form biopic of jazz musician Miles Davis depicts his attempts at a career comeback following a period of listlessness in the '70s, his relationship with a journalist who wants to profile him and his troubled marriage to a former dancer(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: James Spader stars as burnt-out FBI agent Joel Campbell, whose attempts to catch a serial killer terrifying Los Angeles end in failure. Moving to Chicago, he seeks psychiatric help from Dr Polly Beilman but then finds his past has come back to haunt him. The killer, David Allen Griffin, has tired of life in the sun and followed him to the Windy City. He taunts Campbell by sending him photographs of the next victim, giving the agent just 24 hours to find them before he kills them. As the murders begin again, Campbell realises he must catch Griffin to lay his own demons to rest, but Griffin's next intended victim is one Campbell knows too well. Joe Charbanic's debut feature is a taut thriller with Spader and Reeves on top form as protagonists who are two sides of the same coin(n)

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: Blaxploitation spoof in the Airplane! style. Nashawn wins a settlement from an airline and buys his first plane - essentially a winged pimpmobile. With a stoned pilot, raunchy cabin crew and on-board jacuzzi, how could the venture fail to take off?(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: There's no need to change your dollars to euros for this hilarious sequel to the 1999 surprise hit that finds Deuce (Rob Schneider) investigating the murders of male prostitutes in Amsterdam and trying to exonerate his old pimp (Eddie Griffin). Jeroen Krabbe, Til Schweiger, Douglas Sills, Carlos Ponce, Hanna Verboom, Miranda Raison, Charles Keating(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Holiday
programme.desc: Gabrielle Union, Morris Chestnut, Queen Latifah, and Terrence Howard star in a film concerning a young girl who implores a department-store Santa to find a new husband for her divorced mother for Christmas. Single mother of three Nancy (Union) has been putting the needs of her three children ahead of her own for as far back as she can remember, and lately her youngest daughter, Emily (Khail Bryant), has become acutely aware of her mother's palpable sadness. As Christmas draws near, Nancy takes her kids to the mall for a cheerful visit with jolly old Saint Nick. When it comes time for Emily's turn to sit on Santa's lap and make her Christmas wish, she selflessly remembers her mother's recent comment that a compliment from a man would be the best gift of all. Determined to make her mother happy again even if it means sacrificing her own wish, Emily relays the message to Santa (Chestnut), not realizing that the man beneath the beard is actually an office-supply salesman and ambitious singer/songwriter named Benjamin. Recognizing the daughter's love for her mother and sensing something truly special in Nancy, Benjamin cheerfully obliges the young girl, setting into motion a series of events that promise to make this the most memorable holiday in quite some time. Lance Rivera directs a film produced by Shakim Compere and Latifah through Flavor Unit Entertainment(n)

programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's classic sci-fi tale about two ordinary Midwesterners who are transformed by extraordinary chance meetings with visitors from outer space. Vilmos Zsigmond won an Oscar for his dazzling cinematography(n)

programme.desc: The French schoolgirl from the beloved children's stories sings songs with her pals(n)

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Comedy about a father who decides to make amends for his long hours at the office by buying his son the Christmas season's hottest new toy. Desperate to locate a 'Turbo Man', the frantic father stops at nothing to find one, battling it out with a mailman who is after the same toy(n)

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: The sub-zero heroes from the worldwide blockbuster CGI film Ice Age are back. In the new film, the Ice Age is coming to an end, and the animals are delighting in the melting paradise that is their new world. Ray Romano, John Leguizamo and Denis Leary return to voice our three heroes: Manny, Sid, and Diego. New cast members include Academy AwardR nominee Queen Latifah (Chicago), Seann William Scott (the American Pie trilogy), late night talk show king Jay Leno, Will Arnett (Arrested Development) and Josh Peck (Drake and Josh). Ice Age: The Meltdown has everything you loved about the first movie with even more comedy, action, and spectacular visuals. Our three heroes' unyielding friendship lives on with some memorable new characters thrown into the mix. The result will thaw hearts of all ages. Starring Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Queen Latifah and Seann William Scott(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: Steve Carr's comedy stars Martin Lawrence as Roy McCormick, a basketball coach with anger issues who eventually ends up facing a lengthy ban. His agent suggests a little humility might lessen the blow and gets him a job coaching the Smelters, probably the worst school team in town. At first despairing of a team who can't catch, pass or shoot, McCormick licks them into shape. But on the eve of their big match, he receives an offer to return to top level coaching. Will he take the offer or stay with the Smelters in their hour of need?(n)

programme.desc: Former Disney animator Don Bluth co-directed this adventurous sci-fi tale about 31st-century humans whose planet was destroyed by the evil Drej aliens. Only a handful of survivors remain who can find the Titan, a secret weapon that can re-create Earth. Voices include Matt Damon, Bill Pullman, Drew Barrymore, John Leguizamo(n)

programme.title: Super Capers
programme.desc: Wonderfully wacky romp about an aspiring crimefighter (Justin Whalin) whose "[super]powers are in development" when he joins a league of hapless superheroes on a time-traveling adventure to fight the forces of evil and thwart a supervillain and his scheme to become a gold-bullion-aire. Michael Rooker, Danielle Harris, Ryan McPartlin, Doug Jones, Tom Sizemore, June Lockhart. Produced, written and directed by Ray Griggs, who costars as caped crusader "Puffer Boy."(n)

programme.title: The Last Legion
programme.desc: Rome, 476 AD. The Roman Empire, a mighty force for almost 500 years, is under threat. On the eve of the coronation of 12-year-old Romulus Augustus, barbarian general Odoacer arrives in Rome to make demands in exchange for his years supporting the Roman legions in the east. But when he is refused, the barbarian army storms the city. Romulus is captured and taken to the island fortress of Capri. The Byzantine Empire initially offer the boy emperor sanctuary but they later betray him and join forces with Odoacer's army of Goths. Faced with treason, Romulus and his allies must set off in search of the one legion in the Empire that is still loyal to him - the Ninth in Britannia(n)

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
programme.desc: Tobe Hooper's influential cult classic continues the subgenre of horror films based on the life and "career" of Wisconsin serial killer Ed Gein, which began with Alfred Hitchcock's own influential cult classic Psycho. When Sally Hardesty (Marilyn Burns) hears that the Texas cemetery where her grandfather is buried has been vandalized, she gathers her wheelchair-bound brother Franklin (Paul A. Partain) and several other friends together to see if grandpa's remains are still in one piece. While in the area, Sally and her friends decide to visit grandfather's old farmhouse. Unfortunately, a family of homicidal slaughterhouse workers who take their job home with them have taken over the house next door. Included amongst the brood is Leatherface (Gunnar Hansen), a chainsaw-wielding human horror show who wears a face mask made out of human skin. Sally's friends are rapidly exterminated one-by-one by the next-door neighbors, leaving only Sally left to fight off Leatherface and his clan(n)

programme.title: Night of the Wild
programme.desc: Pet dogs turn mysteriously aggressive, attacking and killing people, after a large meteor crashes into a quiet town(n)

programme.title: Animal
programme.desc: A carnivorous beast stalks a group of young campers on a weekend retreat in the woods. Seeking refuge in a remote cabin, the terrified survivors devise a plan to fight back(n)

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: Jude Law and Forest Whitaker star in this blood-drenched thriller-cum-satire set in a grimy vision of the near future. Technology has finally solved the problem of organ transplants, at least for those who can afford them. But beware: fall behind on the payments and the organ provider will dispatch repo men with sharp blades to reclaim their property in a swift but grisly operation. Remy and Jake work for one such company, The Union, and are among its best 'bailiffs', performing their allotted tasks ruthlessly. Until, that is, Remy is forced to rely on one of The Union's products himself - at which point his perspective is radically reassessed and he goes on the run, hotly pursued by his erstwhile colleague. Also starring Liev Schreiber and Alice Braga(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution
programme.desc: In this stylish and action-packed sequel, a vampire warrior traces the origins of an ancient feud between tribes of bloodsuckers and werewolves(n)

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Daredevil biker Johnny Blaze sells his soul and becomes the devil's fiery-skulled bounty hunter in this Marvel Comics adaptation(n)

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: This hilariously skewed take on the zombie movie finds a cowardly shut-in teaming up with a seasoned zombie slayer and two resilient young girls to battle the legions of the undead(n)

programme.title: From Dusk till Dawn
programme.desc: The notorious Gecko brothers, two of America's most dangerous criminals, are on the run from the Texas police and the FBI after a crime spree through the Southwest. Across the border in Mexico, the mysterious Carlos offers sanctuary to criminals on the lam, but first they must slip past the border patrol. The Gecko brothers kidnap a whole family and high-tail it to freedom with the promise to let the family go once they hook up with their criminal connection in Mexico. The rendezvous point is the Titty Twister, the wildest bar this side of the Rio Grande. The night is full of seductive promise as the group settles back to wait for Carlos and his boys to arrive at sunrise. But unbeknownst to the brothers or their hostages, the management and staff of this particular establishment have a taste for blood - in the vampire sense…(n)

programme.title: Animal
programme.desc: A carnivorous beast stalks a group of young campers on a weekend retreat in the woods. Seeking refuge in a remote cabin, the terrified survivors devise a plan to fight back(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Back There. After speculating on the possibility that a person can travel back in time and change history, Peter Corrigan (Russell Johnson) bids farewell to his friends and prepares to head home from his club. As he walks through the doors, he is unexpectedly transported from 1961 to 1865. Once he gets his bearings, Corrigan finds himself in a position to prevent the assassination of Abraham Lincoln -- but this "wrinkle in time" turns out to have entirely different results. Scripted by Rod Serling, "Back There" is one of the lesser offerings of Twilight Zone's 1960-61 season, though it does boast an excellent musical score by Jerry Goldsmith, which would remain in the standard TV stock-music repertoire throughout the 1960s and 1970s. The episode first aired January 13, 1961(n)

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Printer's Devil. In his last Twilight Zone appearance, Burgess Meredith stars as Mr. Smith, a slightly demonic fellow who offers his services as a reporter and typesetter to small-town newspaper editor Doug Winter (Robert Serling). Knowing full well that Winter's Danzburg Courier is on the verge of folding, Smith promises to save the publication from ruin. This he does by reporting tragic incidents that haven't happened yet -- and then making certain that they do happen. Adapted by Charles Beaumont from his own short story "The Devil, You Say?", "Printer's Devil" first aired February 28, 1963(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars in this action-thriller set in the paranoid world of espionage. Evelyn Salt is a successful CIA agent who abruptly goes on the run when a Russian defector claims that she is actually a sleeper agent, planted long ago and now about to commit a terrible act of terrorism. Naturally, this only compounds the suspicion about her true identity and soon she's pursued a variety of government agencies, all of whom are out to prevent her completing her alleged deadly mission. But is she really a traitor, or has she been set up simply to provide distraction from the real conspirator? Also starring Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor(n)

programme.desc: A vampire slayer hunts modern-day undead. An edgy combination of action, film noir and comic-book fantasy, but the film lacks emotional depth(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Seer. The detectives are skeptical when Tim Grayson (Robert Stanton), a self-proclaimed psychic, insists that he has envisioned the murder of his attractive neighbor, who is found beaten to death outside a sex club. The fact that Grayson is the archetypal misfit loner, coupled with the discovery of his shoe print at the crime scene, is enough for the DA's office to draw up murder charges against him. But though Assistant District Attorney McCoy (Sam Waterson) is confident of a conviction, it turns out that just appearing to be guilty as hell isn't quite enough -- and that there are radically different degrees of "guilt."(n)

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: Based on the best-selling young-adult novel by author Suzanne Collins, The Hunger Games tells the dark tale of a 16-year-old girl named Katniss Everdeen (Jennifer Lawrence), who volunteers to compete in a vicious televised tournament in which 24 teenagers from a post-apocalyptic society fight to the death for the entertainment of the masses. In the future, North America is no more. In its place has risen Panem, a divided nation split into 12 districts. Every year, each district selects a teen of each gender (called "Tributes") to test their worth in a competition known as the Hunger Games, which are broadcast across the nation as entertainment, and to reinforce the government's total power. When her younger sister is selected as District 12's latest "Tribute," Katniss volunteers to take her place, and trains under hard-drinking former Hunger Games champion Haymitch Abernathy (Woody Harrelson) to sharpen her killer instincts. Now in order to survive the game and emerge the victor, this young combatant must put all of her skills to the ultimate test. Josh Hutcherson and Liam Hemsworth co-star(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family
programme.desc: Adapted from the multi-talented playwright/filmmaker's hit stage play of the same name, Tyler Perry's Madea's Big Happy Family finds the cantankerous family matriarch using her unique brand of tough love to help her family weather some particularly rough waters. Madea's niece Shirley has received a frightening medical diagnosis, and she's having a hard time figuring out how to break the news to the rest of the family. Unfortunately she's not the only one in the midst of a crisis, either: Kimberly is suffering from anger issues that are threatening to destroy her marriage; Tammy's marital problems are being compounded by her disobedient children; and Byron is struggling to stay out of the drug trade after spending two years behind bars. Later, as a skeleton in the family closet pops into the picture, Madea and Aunt Bam show that love and laugher can help to overcome even the biggest obstacles(n)
